import React from "react"; function Works() { return (

How It Works

Step 1

Search for Charitable Organizations

Browse through a wide range of charitable organizations and causes to find the ones that align with your values and interests.

Step 2

Select a Donation Amount

Choose the amount you wish to donate and select the payment method that is most convenient for you.

Step 3

Make a Difference

Your donation will directly support the chosen charitable organization and contribute to their mission of making a positive impact.

); } export default HowItWorks;
